headline.print_headline: Agency Awards $60 Million in Tribal Housing Grants
headline.main: Agency Awards $60 Million in Tribal Housing Grants

docs.lead_paragraph: The federal government has awarded nearly $60 million in grants to more than 90 tribal communities across the nation, including 15 in Alaska, U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development Secretary Julian Castro announced Monday in Anchorage.
docs.snippet: The federal government has awarded nearly $60 million in grants to more than 90 tribal communities across the nation, including 15 in Alaska, U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development Secretary Julian Castro announced Monday in Anchorage.

headline.print_headline: Tax on Sodas Eyed in San Francisco, Berkeley
headline.main: Tax on Sodas Eyed in San Francisco, Berkeley

docs.lead_paragraph: A tax on sodas and other sugar-laden drinks that voters and courts in other parts of the country have rejected is on the November ballots in San Francisco and Berkeley, two cities that have been open to such social-engineering initiatives in the past.
docs.snippet: A tax on sodas and other sugar-laden drinks that voters and courts in other parts of the country have rejected is on the November ballots in San Francisco and Berkeley, two cities that have been open to such social-engineering initiatives in the...

headline.main: Shamed, Flamed, Harassed: What It’s Like To Be Called Fat Online

docs.abstract: A new study documents the insults and harassment overweight people can face on social media, and its findings may give the public health community a look at the realities of weight stigma.
docs.snippet: A new study documents the insults and harassment overweight people can face on social media, and its findings may give the public health community a look at the realities of weight stigma.

headline.main: The Workout: A Star Chef Finds Inspiration

docs.abstract: Marcus Samuelsson, the best-selling author and owner of the Harlem restaurant Red Rooster, discussed his exercise routine and his latest cookbook, “Marcus Off Duty: The Recipes I Cook at Home.”
docs.snippet: Marcus Samuelsson, the best-selling author and owner of the Harlem restaurant Red Rooster, discussed his exercise routine and his latest cookbook, “Marcus Off Duty: The Recipes I Cook at Home.”

headline.print_headline: Silicon Valley Takes Benefits 'Arms Race' to Health Care
headline.main: Silicon Valley Takes Benefits 'Arms Race' to Health Care

docs.lead_paragraph: High salaries and free food aren't enough any more in Silicon Valley, where maturing companies are competing for talent with creative health care and "wellness" programs that use gadgets to promote good behavior.
docs.snippet: High salaries and free food aren't enough any more in Silicon Valley, where maturing companies are competing for talent with creative health care and "wellness" programs that use gadgets to promote good behavior.

headline.seo: CrossFit Programs for Preschoolers Focus on Fun

docs.abstract: CrossFit, hard-core workout regimen, is now being aimed at preschoolers; as the issue of youth fitness takes on more resonance in schools and communities across the country, CrossFit Kids and other preschool fitness programs are raising questions about when and how children should start playing organized sports or hitting the gym.
docs.lead_paragraph: Physical fitness for children has become big business as gyms and workout centers continue to wind back the ages of their youngest customers.
docs.snippet: Physical fitness for children has become big business as gyms and workout centers continue to wind back the ages of their youngest customers.

headline.seo: When There’s a Vegetarian Child in the Family
headline.print_headline: When Chicken Fingers Come Off the Menu
headline.main: Chicken Fingers Are Off the Menu

docs.abstract: Pamela Paul shares why her child's decision to become a vegetarian terrified her.
docs.lead_paragraph: Now that my daughter has become a vegetarian, I fear I am doomed to turn into the dreaded Restaurant Mom, tailoring meal planning to each of my children’s fancies.
docs.snippet: Now that my daughter has become a vegetarian, I fear I am doomed to turn into the dreaded Restaurant Mom, tailoring meal planning to each of my children’s fancies.
